availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Barbara Ann Wade Roark in Allen County, Kentucky, on November 11, 1839. Father of Nellie J. Roark, Granville W. Roark, Francis M. Roark, Martha D. J. Roark, and Robert H. Roark. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 38B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 69.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Allen County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 27.
Find A Grave, "Hiram Roark (12 Oct 1818-24 Nov 1907)," Memorial #107739824, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/107739824 (accessed September 17, 2020).
